stepAnswer: $$y=\sqrt{1-x^2}$$ and $$-\sqrt{1-x^2}$$, $$y$$ is not a function of $$x$$.
stepTitle: Does the equation $$x^2+y^2=1$$ represent a function with $$x$$ as input and $$y$$ as output? If so, express the relationship as a function $$y=f(x)$$.
answerLatex: $$y=\sqrt{1-x^2}$$ and $$-\sqrt{1-x^2}$$, $$y$$ is not a function of $$x$$.
choices: $$y=\sqrt{1-x^2}$$ and $$-\sqrt{1-x^2}$$, $$y$$ is not a function of $$x$$.
